nodes.bodyText: Can you just clean up this white space difference ?

nodes.bodyText: Is this necessary? I think we get junit for free for any FAT buckets, or is there something specific here for the websocket tests?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+/*******************************************************************************
+* Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+* All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+* are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+* which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+* http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+*
+* Contributors:
+*     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+*******************************************************************************/
+
+dependencies {
+  requiredLibs 'net.sf.jtidy:jtidy:9.3.8',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty.websocket:websocket-client:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty.websocket:websocket-api:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty.websocket:websocket-common:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'javax.websocket:javax.websocket-api:1.0',
+    'commons-codec:commons-codec:1.11',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty.websocket:javax-websocket-client-impl:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-io:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-util:9.2.2.v20140723',
+    'org.apache.httpcomponents:httpclient:4.5.4',
+    'commons-logging:commons-logging:1.1.3'
+}
+
+addRequiredLibraries {
+  doLast {
+    // Define dependency groups
+    configurations {
+      junit
+    }
+    // Define G:A:V coordinates of each dependency
+    dependencies {
+      junit 'junit:junit:4.12'
+    }
+    // Copy the dependencies wherever they may be needed
+    copy {
+      // Copy junit jars into a specific folder so they can be referenced
+      from configurations.junit
+      into "${buildDir}/autoFVT/test-applications/basic.war/resources/WEB-INF/lib"
+    }

nodes.bodyText: do we actually need jsp/el/servlet here?

commit.message: Initial port from Websphere Liberty to Open Liberty

Updated test to work on Open Liberty
- Built the test applications in the way open liberty does
- Updated copyright with the correct open liberty copyrights
- Updated cnf for new jars added to artifactory
Made requested changes to spacing and build clean up

beforeCommit.message: Made requested changes to spacing and build clean up

afterCommit.message: Made requested changes to spacing and build clean up
